duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the preparation of the business unit’s financial statements and other financial and operating reports.
Perform appropriate financial analysis and prepare special financial and statistical reports.
Prepare the annual and long-range financial plan, and monthly financial forecasts.
Provide financial oversight for cost accounting and annual standards setting processes.
Establish required financial controls and monitor compliance.
Manage working capital and maintain balance sheet integrity.
Prepare account reconciliations and approve capital expenditure requests.
Enforce compliance with Policies and Procedures and Limits of Authority.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree (Accounting or Business degree, preferred). Master’s Degree a plus. CPA preferred. Five or more years of related experience.
